physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Bright, nondysmorphic girl with an armspan 5 cm longer than height, mildly translucent teeth, normal sclerae, kyphoscoliosis, decreased flexibility. Hearing and vision are normal.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Height loss from the 95th percentile to the 25th percentile after the onset of vertebral fractures.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Decreased lumbar spine Z-score of -2.9 from a DXA scan.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Spine Z-score improved to -2.5 after 12 months of therapy.
